plot: Every day Mirza spends with women. Every day he has to re-visit them and make them all happy. Today, he says goodbye to everybody.
title: Scene sa zenama
plot_es: Every day Mirza spends with women. Every day he has to re-visit them and make them all happy. Today, he says goodbye to everybody.
plot_en: Every day Mirza spends with women. Every day he has to re-visit them and make them all happy. Today, he says goodbye to everybody.
